definition: Fei Xiaotong (1910-2005), Chinese sociologist
to cost/to spend/fee/wasteful/expenses
surname Fei
filial piety or obedience/mourning apparel
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: Chapters III and IV make a specific analysis of the international outlook of Fei Xiaotong.
sentences.chinese: 第三章和第四章对费孝通的国际观内涵作具体解析。

sentences.english: The investigation of Dayaoshan had changed Fei Xiaotong's direction of the academic research in all his life.
sentences.chinese: 大瑶山的考察改变了费孝通一生学术研究的方向。

sentences.english: Jiangcun village study, initiated by Prof. Fei Xiaotong, has witnessed a history of seventy years.
sentences.chinese: 由费孝通教授开创的江村研究已有七十年的历史。

definition: Liang Shuming (1893-1988), modern philosopher and teacher in the neo-Confucian tradition
Feng Youlan (1895-1990), distinguished Chinese philosopher
Shen Congwen (1902-1988), novelist
Hu Shi (1891-1962), original proponent of writing in colloquial Chinese 白話文|白话文[bai2 hua4 wen2]
Ye Shengtao (1894-1988), writer and editor, known esp. for children's books
Mao Dun (1896-1981), Chinese novelist
Ji Xianlin (1911-2009), Chinese linguist and Indologist
Lu Xun (1881-1936), one of the earliest and best-known modern Chinese writers
Wen Yiduo (1899-1946), poet and patriotic fighter, executed by Guomindang in Kunming
Modern New Confucianism/see also 新儒家[Xin1 Ru2 jia1]
Jian Bozan (1898-1968), Chinese Marxist historian and vice-president of Bejing University 1952-1968
Jonathan D Spence (1936-), distinguished British US historian of China, author of The search for modern China 追尋現代中國|追寻现代中国
Yuen Ren Chao (1892-1982), Chinese-American linguist
Cai Yuanpei (1868-1940), liberal educationalist, studied in Germany, president of Peking University 1917-19, minister of education for Guomindang
Sun Li (1913-2002), novelist
Qian Zhongshu (1910-1998), literary academic and novelist, author of the 1947 novel Fortress Beseiged 圍城|围城
